channel.title: Welcome to Dimmu!
channel.description:
Well, I have had many **** servers, as meaning, hardly anything SEMI DECENT in it at all.
How I got into PServs: Well one day I was browsing [url=http://www.sythe.org]www.sythe.org[/url], and I came across these "private servers". I asked one person how to use them, and he told me I had to be really good at SCAR lmao, and I believed him. So a few months later I came across [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf]www.moparisthebest.com/smf[/url], and registered. From then on I started to code. I slowly learned, and put out two servers that made it, and averaged 20 people on every hour or so. But this story is horrible, so here comes the updates. Now a little slideshow:
[url=http://img228.imageshack.us/slideshow/player.php?id=img228/6698/11875963573xz.smil]Slideshow of Masked Items![/url]
Goal: Rent a DEDICATED SERVER! I will accept donations ranging from 100K-1M, or how much you want to. I only accept RSGP, because I can make a lot more than what I'd be sent by selling it to RL friends. I don't have a Paypal, and I don't want random amounts of cash being sent to me in the mail, because my parents would be pissed. So if you want to donate, I'll need $105 I believe for the first month. {About 20M for the first month. I can get about $5-$6 per mil from my friends, because they have jobs, and are 2-3 years older than me. Keep in mind, I'm only 14, and my parents don't want random people sending me money in the mail..}
[size=28pt]IF YOU WISH TO DONATE, PM ME OR POST![/size]
Update 1: Re-named from WhiteScape to Dimmu Update 2: Custom specials (yes DDS double hits) Update 3: Dark Bow Update 4: Added in a bunch of missing methods Update 5: Perfect Mining Update 6: Perfect Woodcutting Update 7: Perfect Herblore Update 8: Perfect working Wilderness. (Levels work, ect) Update 9: Magic is now off limits until I can fix the lag from Item Masking Update 10: Item Masked Rune Dagger, God Books, Desert Top, Seercull, ect Update 11: Removed a bunch of un-needed things, not going into detail Update 12: Touched up picking up, so it only needs 1 click, kind of slow to pick up though Update 13: Torso Minigame Update 14: Portals with options Update 15: PKing in Edgeville for 1V1 Update 16: PKing at Mage Bank for teams/clans Update 17: Item Masked Team-1 to Team-7 capes Update 18: 100% working CWars and Team Capes, can't attack others with the same cape Update 19: Touched up PKing Update 20: Added in decent Dueling Update 21: Removed Dueling, way to buggy Update 22: Minigame for Prayer-27% complete lol, thinking of removing Update 23: Pots lower skill over time Update 24: Shows the animation when you drink a potion Update 25: Perfect Weapon timers Update 26: Perfect healing amount Update 27: Near perfect eating timers Update 28: Decent max hits Update 29: Fixed all Medium Helms Update 30: Most items in item.cfg are touched up to meet bonuses, not prices Update 31: Best store bought item is a Black Square Update 32: **** load of NPC drops Update 33: Training on NPC's (200 XP per hit, hit a 5, get 1K exp) pretty fast Update 34: Added in new training area Update 35: Max skill is 100 Update 36: All Magic spells require 101 Magic, because it lags a lot on the Magic tab Update 37: Was based in Catherby, now based in Lumbridge, all blocked off Update 38: Correct NPC positions in Falador, shops don't work, because un-needed Update 39: Fishing in Catherby, just need to loop it so it continues the animation Update 40: Need to have the required item(s) to fish, along with the correct level Update 41: Anyone using Xeroz's cheat client is banned, prints it out in my runserver Update 42: Anyone using Azn's cheat client is banned, prints it out in my runserver Update 43: Anyone using Sly's cheat client is banned, prints it out in my runserver Update 44: Hopefully fixed 2H/Bows with shields Update 45: Fixed animations on all Magics, including Ancient Magicks! Update 46: PHATS, MASKS, SANTAS, ALL RARES ARE UN-TRADEABLE! Update 47: Don't know if I posted, but anti-spam system now! Update 48: Thinking of removing Item Masking, as there is no purpose in Magic since it lags to much! Update 49: Fixed maxed hits for 78% of weapons!! Update 50: Fixed teleporting animations, you know, getting stuck small, ect Update 51: Custom Player Titles, thanks Mr. Dune! Update 52: Removed Item Masking.. Magic is now working! Update 53: You can now use Magic! >>>>>>>><<<<<<<< Things to come: Less shops More NPC Drops Bug Fixes Skiller Island-Consists of things to do with skilling Melee Island-Consists of NPC's that melee Ranger Island-Consists of NPC's that range Magical Isle-Consists of NPC's that mage Better max hits Better max hits for NPC's Dragon Mace special Minigame to obtain Dragon items Less portals, make them have more than 1 option A base for at least 18 skills, possibly all >>>>>>>><<<<<<<< Client Updates: Update 1: Re-named the client to Dimmu Client Update 2: Moving Fire Capes Update 3: Item Masking Update 4: New background Update 5: Tons of colors lol >>>>>>>><<<<<<<< Things to come: A custom sprite for Vengeance New color scheme Better background >>>>>>>><<<<<<<< I suck with clients, just using one so Item Masking works >>>>>>>><<<<<<<<
If you would like to apply for in-game Moderator, please fill out this application: [CODE] Real Life Name: Age: Country: Experience: Why should I pick you: AT LEAST 20 WORDS! [/CODE] If you would like to apply for in-game Administrator, please fill out this application: [CODE] Real Life Name: Age: Country: NO MORE POSITIONS NEEDED! I NEED 2 MODS FOR NOW! Experience: Why should I pick you: AT LEAST 40 words [/CODE]
Staff List Owner: Fr33b1e Admin(s): Matrx, ReapR Ltd.(AKA Owner Reaper) Mod(s): Reaper, Brad, and Planplan.
Thanks, Fr33b1e

item.title: Welcome to Dimmu!
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Aww, that’d be really kind of you to donate. I don’t care if it ranges from only 100K to whatever you want. All donations above 100K help a lot. I need to update it a bit more.

EDIT:
About 3 new updates guys. I’m removing Item Masking so Magic has a point. I will post pictures soon, I need to start adding portals back in… :S

Read full topic

item.title: Welcome to Dimmu!
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Plan, if you’re applying for Admin, I can’t accept it. I have to many for now. But… I like two parts of your application.
“Mature enough to handle the pressure and power”
“Honest person”

Probably two of the most important qualities I’ll look for within a staff member. I don’t need anymore staff, but with the exception of those two statements, I’ll accept it. Please, no more posts applying for a Staff position!

Read full topic

Country: Canada
Experience:Alot, Fact I been admin on many servers.
Why should I pick you:
Very nice, polite, respected, mature enough to handle the preasure and power, and a fun to have around person. I can provide alot of good
rules and strick about my job. I can play over 5hours a day. Quiet active.
Honest person.

item.title: Welcome to Dimmu!
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Steviie, post:10, topic:136924”][quote author=Fr33b1e link=topic=188473.msg1701732#msg1701732 date=1188085371]
Shut up Steviie. I need donations if you want it be up 24/7 with NO LAG. I only accept RUNESCAPE because I sell mils/items to my friends IRL. I don’t have Paypal because my dad is to lazy to talk to the bank about it. My parents are also strict about the fact of people sending me small/large amounts of cash, and especially about people they don’t know. If you think I’m doing this to get “fr33 itemz plz”, you can just leave my thread. If my parents were less strict, I’d accept cash by mail, but they’re just like that.
[/quote]

You mean leave your topic. Anyway, alot of people say this, in the end they end up getting scammed. I ‘DONATED’ a whip with torag legs. In the end, 2 days later, I was banned and he made about 20+ mill by ‘DONATIONS’ rofl.[/quote]
Steviie, stfu.
Stop looking at others but look at yourself.
Your acting like a monkey.

Talking with fr33 about this in pm

Read full topic

item.title: Welcome to Dimmu!
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Thanks. This server is going to be a fun/learning experience for me. I have learned A LOT since the tutorial section was pruned. THANKS SO MUCH MOPARSCAPE! It is 500X better since it was pruned.
I have 1 Mod AT THE MOMENT, but I can’t remember his name. I believe it’s just Reaper, on a site I go to that Harvey owns. But I won’t go to far into detail about it. Keep the posts coming! I want to have a 2:10 ratio of posts to views. The more you post, the more I update.

item.title: Welcome to Dimmu!
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Well, I have had many **** servers, as meaning, hardly anything SEMI DECENT in it at all.

How I got into PServs:
Well one day I was browsing www.sythe.org, and I came across these “private servers”. I asked one person how to use them, and he told me I had to be really good at SCAR lmao, and I believed him. So a few months later I came across www.moparisthebest.com/smf, and registered. From then on I started to code. I slowly learned, and put out two servers that made it, and averaged 20 people on every hour or so. But this story is horrible, so here comes the updates.
Now a little slideshow:

Slideshow of Masked Items!

Goal:
Rent a DEDICATED SERVER!
I will accept donations ranging from 100K-1M, or how much you want to. I only accept RSGP, because I can make a lot more than what I’d be sent by selling it to RL friends. I don’t have a Paypal, and I don’t want random amounts of cash being sent to me in the mail, because my parents would be pissed. So if you want to donate, I’ll need $105 I believe for the first month. {About 20M for the first month. I can get about $5-$6 per mil from my friends, because they have jobs, and are 2-3 years older than me. Keep in mind, I’m only 14, and my parents don’t want random people sending me money in the mail…}

[size=28pt]IF YOU WISH TO DONATE, PM ME OR POST![/size]

Update 1: Re-named from WhiteScape to Dimmu
Update 2: Custom specials (yes DDS double hits)
Update 3: Dark Bow
Update 4: Added in a bunch of missing methods
Update 5: Perfect Mining
Update 6: Perfect Woodcutting
Update 7: Perfect Herblore
Update 8: Perfect working Wilderness. (Levels work, ect)
Update 9: Magic is now off limits until I can fix the lag from Item Masking
Update 10: Item Masked Rune Dagger, God Books, Desert Top, Seercull, ect
Update 11: Removed a bunch of un-needed things, not going into detail
Update 12: Touched up picking up, so it only needs 1 click, kind of slow to pick up though
Update 13: Torso Minigame
Update 14: Portals with options
Update 15: PKing in Edgeville for 1V1
Update 16: PKing at Mage Bank for teams/clans
Update 17: Item Masked Team-1 to Team-7 capes
Update 18: 100% working CWars and Team Capes, can’t attack others with the same cape
Update 19: Touched up PKing
Update 20: Added in decent Dueling
Update 21: Removed Dueling, way to buggy
Update 22: Minigame for Prayer-27% complete lol, thinking of removing
Update 23: Pots lower skill over time
Update 24: Shows the animation when you drink a potion
Update 25: Perfect Weapon timers
Update 26: Perfect healing amount
Update 27: Near perfect eating timers
Update 28: Decent max hits
Update 29: Fixed all Medium Helms
Update 30: Most items in item.cfg are touched up to meet bonuses, not prices
Update 31: Best store bought item is a Black Square
Update 32: **** load of NPC drops
Update 33: Training on NPC’s (200 XP per hit, hit a 5, get 1K exp) pretty fast
Update 34: Added in new training area
Update 35: Max skill is 100
Update 36: All Magic spells require 101 Magic, because it lags a lot on the Magic tab
Update 37: Was based in Catherby, now based in Lumbridge, all blocked off
Update 38: Correct NPC positions in Falador, shops don’t work, because un-needed
Update 39: Fishing in Catherby, just need to loop it so it continues the animation
Update 40: Need to have the required item(s) to fish, along with the correct level
Update 41: Anyone using Xeroz’s cheat client is banned, prints it out in my runserver
Update 42: Anyone using Azn’s cheat client is banned, prints it out in my runserver
Update 43: Anyone using Sly’s cheat client is banned, prints it out in my runserver
Update 44: Hopefully fixed 2H/Bows with shields
Update 45: Fixed animations on all Magics, including Ancient Magicks!
Update 46: PHATS, MASKS, SANTAS, ALL RARES ARE UN-TRADEABLE!
Update 47: Don’t know if I posted, but anti-spam system now!
Update 48: Thinking of removing Item Masking, as there is no purpose in Magic since it lags to much!
Update 49: Fixed maxed hits for 78% of weapons!!
Update 50: Fixed teleporting animations, you know, getting stuck small, ect
Update 51: Custom Player Titles, thanks Mr. Dune!
Update 52: Removed Item Masking… Magic is now working!
Update 53: You can now use Magic!

<<<<<<<<
Things to come:
Less shops
More NPC Drops
Bug Fixes
Skiller Island-Consists of things to do with skilling
Melee Island-Consists of NPC’s that melee
Ranger Island-Consists of NPC’s that range
Magical Isle-Consists of NPC’s that mage
Better max hits
Better max hits for NPC’s
Dragon Mace special
Minigame to obtain Dragon items
Less portals, make them have more than 1 option
A base for at least 18 skills, possibly all

<<<<<<<<
Client Updates:
Update 1: Re-named the client to Dimmu Client
Update 2: Moving Fire Capes
Update 3: Item Masking
Update 4: New background
Update 5: Tons of colors lol

<<<<<<<<
Things to come:
A custom sprite for Vengeance
New color scheme
Better background

<<<<<<<<
I suck with clients, just using one so Item Masking works

<<<<<<<<
